node.title: Hollywood Walk of Fame Shooting During Vicente Fernandez Memorial
node.alt: A stock photo of police tape. The Los Angeles Police Department are investigating a reported shooting from an apartment across from a place where people gathered to remember Mexican singer Vicente Fern√°ndez on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
node.description: Witnesses said a male suspect, allegedly a resident of a nearby apartment block, was taken into custody at around 7:45 p.m.
node.content:
["The Los Angeles Police Department is investigating a reported shooting from an apartment across from an area where people gathered to remember Mexican singer Vicente Fern\u00e1ndez on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on Sunday night.", "CBSLA reported that the windows of a building at 62000 Hollywood Boulevard were blown out by the shooting, which took place just after 7 p.m. Sunday.", "Witnesses said a male suspect, allegedly a resident of the building, was taken into custody at around 7:45 p.m.", "The LAPD have shut down Hollywood Boulevard to investigate the scene.", "Witnesses told CBSLA that they saw a person's arm holding a handgun from an upper story window in the apartment block opposite the memorial, with one of the bullets hitting a shop's glass door.", "Crowds were gathered to commemorate the 81-year-old Mexican Ranchera singer, who died on Sunday morning in Guadalajara in his home state of Jalisco. He had been hospitalized for four months after a fall at his ranch. The singer suffered from Guillain-Barr\u00e9 syndrome, a rare autoimmune disorder in which a person's own immune system damages the nerves.", "", "
A stock photo of police tape. The Los Angeles Police Department are investigating a reported shooting from an apartment across from a place where people gathered to remember Mexican singer Vicente Fern\u00e1ndez on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
"]
